marklogic.body: Oh what a nasty little person, I am not a pensioner yet but would have been nearly there if they hadn't moved the goalposts, do you not realise that many pensioners can't just get out and walk a mile to the bus stop and that when you are old you feel the Cold much more so Heating costs go up and as there are only a few years left before death why shouldn't elderly people be allowed a bit of Comfort. Of course pensioners need money from the state, just as the unemployed do and most have paid more into the system than the young today ever will because school leaving age was 14/15 so retiring at 65 means they have done 50 years of paying taxes and NI.
